summary: A lady fugitive on the run from corrupt government officials is joined in her endeavors by an unambitious painter and skilled Buddhist monks.
cast: Feng Hsu|Chun Shih|Ying Bai|Billy Chan|Ming-Wai Chan|Ping-Yu Chang|Yi-Kuei Chang|Yun-Wen Chang|Shih-Wei Chen|Roy Chiao|Ying-Chieh Han|Li-Jen Ho|Chung-Mou Hsieh|Han Hsieh|Hsing-Chun Hsu|Ming Kao|Ho Chiu Kei|Lu-Shih Ku|Ching-Ying Lam|Kwei Li|Chu Liu|You-Pin Liu|Fei Lung|Chu-Hua Men|Tien Miao|Yao-Kun Pan|Mao Shan|Peng Tien|Chien Tsao|Wei-Ho Tu|Chung-Shan Wan|Jui Wang|Ming-Tsai Wu|Hsi-Chun Yang|Jackie Chan|Sammo Kam-Bo Hung
title: A Touch of Zen
